title: HotS is officially dead game

embed.description: We're constantly changing and evolving not only our games, but how we support and grow them. This evolution is vital to our ability to continue doing what we love to do-making great games-and it's what makes Blizzard, Blizzard.

body: If Riot implemented the terrible design decisions that Blizzard did with HotS it would have never seen the light of day.
